General.Name: Dongil Ind
General.Description: Dongil Industries Co.,Ltd. operates in the steel industry in South Korea. It manufactures hot rolled steel bars; cold drawn bars used in manufacturing parts for automobiles and industrial machinery, and electronic appliances; and CHQ wires used in manufacturing materials for fastener industries and automotive parts. The company also provides peeled bars that are used as parts in cold forged automotive parts, cylinders, and shafts of heavy equipment; and abrasive steel rods used for products that control the burnout of the surface, such as LM guide. In addition, it offers ferro alloys; and steel casting products for excavators and wheel loaders, as well as abrasion resistant steel products. Dongil Industries Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is based in Pohang, South Korea.
